import React from "react" import memesData from "../memesData.js" export default function Meme() { /** * Challenge: Get a random image from the `memesData` array * when the "new meme image" button is clicked. * * Log the URL of the image to the console. (Don't worry * about displaying the image yet) */ const [memeImage, setMemeImage] = React.useState({topText: "", bottomText: "", randomImage: "https://i.imgflip.com/30b1gx.jpg"}) function getImage() { let meme = memesData.data.memes[Math.floor(Math.random() * memesData.data.memes.length)] setMemeImage(image) } return (
) }
